Texts.Eng: Craft a ^green;1 Mining Helmet^reset; at a ^orange;Foraging Table^reset; and return.
I kin finally make ^green;Clementine^reset; a ^orange;symbol of our love^reset; I always promised 'afore her tragic passing back in '72. Take this, and my thanks, friend.

I'm lookin' to acquire some ^orange;Silver^reset;, but I ain't no good in enclosed spaces. You'll find ^orange;Silver^reset; commonly ^green;at a decent depth underground^reset;. ^orange;5 Silver Bars^reset; should be plenty.
